Features.Title: Our Services
Features.Text: We design solutions according to the needs of our clients, guaranteeing that the final product has the quality you deserve, and providing you with a robust, adaptable and scalable system.
Features.S1: Analysis, Design and Development of Software
Features.T1: We provide software solutions to real problems that are 100% adjusted to the needs of our clients, on any platform (mobile, web or desktop).
Features.T2: Hardware development for the automation of luminaires, climate, automatic doors and operating systems for smart home control.
Features.T3: We offer data analysis services, in different technologies, data types, treatment, analysis and visualization. Offering you resources to make the best decisions for your business.
Features.T4: Design of Intranets and platforms to manage the internal communications of any company.
Features.T5: After delivering the solution to our clients, we offer training to future users of the system.
Features.T6: We offer continuous and personalized support and maintenance by specialists in your system.

Related_Work.Title: Related Wordks
Related_Work.Text: A sample of our most successful works, and the clien's reaction to their visualization
Related_Work.w1_Description:
Sistema de ventas online. Venta de electrodomésticos con envio en estados unidos y el caribe. Cuenta con tres sistemas:
1-Cliente (Movil y Web)
2-Administrador (Gestión de la información)
3-Servidor (Comunicación con almacenes de datos)

About.Text: LocalJobs it`s a company focused on software and hardware development, providing customized solutions for each client. Using the most innovative technologies LocalJobs launches everything you imagine for your business.
About.Text2: The systems developed are modular providing  scalability, adaptability and ease of changes. This type of systems will allow the client to add new functions as his business grows and adapt his capabilities in real time.

Professions.Text: We are a multi-disciplinary team, specialized in different branches of engineering
Professions.Resumen-An: Software Engineer graduated at Technological University of Havana. Focused in Data Analysis Tecniques to Support Decision Making
Professions.Resumen-San: Software Engineer, project manager of the company specialized in the development of multiplatform applications, artificial intelligence and business modeling
Professions.Resumen-Car: Robotic researcher with a bachelor degree in Automatics Engineering. Passionate with artificial intelligence and data processing.
